PerfectNetExp.abs: 1、引言性别歧视(Sexism ) , 简单地说, 是指基于性别的偏见或歧视, 尤其是对妇女的歧视。它作为一种普遍的社会现象, 存在于不同的 …
正性别主义(sexism)意指在性别基础上产生的偏见,特别指女性遭受的特殊的压迫,其渊源是传统观念对性别差异的笃信。它包含两层意 …
性别歧视主义(sexism)一般是指基于他人的性别差异而非他人优缺点所造成的厌恶或是歧视，但也可用来指称任何因为性别所造成的差 …
喜福会 - 读书网|DuShu.com ... Lena St.Clair 莉娜·圣克莱尔 Sexism 大男子主义 Sacrifices For Love 为爱而牺牲.

list.abs: 非性别歧视语言,n... ... ) sexist language 性别歧视语言 ) linguistic sexism 语言性别歧视 ) bias-free language 非歧视性语言.
言针对的,是"语言性别主义"(linguistic sexism)(Miller and Swift1988: ix)."性别主义"(sexism)是指贬抑或歧视女性,2 表达女性次于.
历史上，在许多父系社会中，女性被视为「较软弱的一群」。「矛盾的性别歧视主义」（ambivalent sexism）指的是对于女性的憎恶态度及基于施舍的仁慈态度的综合，这种矛盾的文化态度显示在女性较低的社会地位以及男.
studies of sexism language from semantics respect ., 从语义学角度研究性别语言.

the article proposes some semantic correction-strategies such as using sex-neutral language and parallel salutation , adjusting words sequence , and applying neologism so as to eliminate the sexism in English .本文同时也提出了通过使用性别中性词和对等称谓、调整词序、创造新词等语义纠正策略，可消除英语

entry.tran: (通常指对女性的)性别歧视，性别偏见
entry.def: Sexism is the belief that the members of one sex, usually women, are less intelligent or less capable than those of the other sex and need not be treated equally. It is also the behaviour which is the result of this belief.

example.ex: Groups like ours are committed to eradicating homophobia, racism and sexism.
example.tran: 一些像我们这样的团体致力于消除对同性恋的憎恶、种族歧视和性别歧视。

means.word_mean: 1. discriminatory or abusive behavior towards members of the opposite sex

auth_sentence.content: It is current sexism that separates men and women.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is current sexism that separates men and women.

auth_sentence.content: Sexism must have no place in the Liberal Democrats.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sexism must have no place in the Liberal Democrats.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sexism must have no place in the Liberal Democrats.

auth_sentence.content: Have you ever experienced sexism in any way?
auth_sentence.res_content: Have you ever experienced sexism in any way?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Have you ever experienced sexism in any way?

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具备某种性质"; 2. 表示"学术或学术流派,行业"; 3. 表示"行为,现象,状态"; 4. 表示"疾病"; 5. 名词,表示"各种主义,宗教"

Sentence.sentence: Boys in mixed schools view classical music as feminine (女性的) and prefer the modem genre (类型) in which violence and sexism are major themes, "James wrote.
